name: Mobile Data Widget
description: The widget is designed to enable/disable mobile network data transfer (mobile traffic control). For Android 5 and above the option enable/disable data transfer is supported only with root. Without root it opens preferences.  Now it shows actual status of mobile data transfer. For Android version under 5 works correctly as usual.  Install best apps from Bastion7.   Tested on Samsung Galaxy S7, S6, S5, Note 7, Sony Xperia Z2, M4 Aqua, C5 Ultra, Z3, Z5, LGE, Asus ZenFone.
